name: Sappi Europe SA
membership: The Confederation of European Paper Industries
goal:
Sappi Europe SA is committed to collaborating and partnering with stakeholders- we aim to be a trusted and sustainable organisation with an exciting
future in woodfibre.

Through 'intentional evolution' we will continue to grow Sappi into a profitable diversified woodfibre group – focused on dissolving wood pulp, paper and products in adjacent fields.”
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Promoting Circular Economy
Countering Greenhouse Gas Emissions
Free Trade, anti dumping and anti distorting subsidies
relevant BREF documents
